entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
